00042 // Enums
00044 
00045 // This process type enumeration is obviously subject to changes
00046 // based on the game design, for example, we are assuming the game will
00047 // have separate behaviors for voice, music, and sound effects
00048 // when in actuality, this engine will play all sound processes the same way
00049 
00050 enum PROCESS_TYPE
00051 {
00052         PROC_NONE,
00053         PROC_WAIT,
00054         PROC_SPRITE,
00055         PROC_CONTROL,
00056         PROC_SCREEN,
00057         PROC_MUSIC,
00058         PROC_SOUNDFX,
00059         PROC_INTERPOLATOR,
00060         PROC_GAMESPECIFIC
00061 };

00065 // Flags
00067 
00068 static const int PROCESS_FLAG_ATTACHED          = 0x00000001;

00070 
00072 // CProcess Description
00073 //
00074 // This is a base class whose instantiations attach to the CProcessManager,
00075 // which updates them once per game loop. Useful for creating animations,
00076 // game objects that need ticking, etc.
00077 //
00079 
00080 class CProcess 
00081 {
00082         friend class CProcessManager;
00083 
00084 protected:
00085         int                                     m_iType;                // type of process running
00086         bool                            m_bKill;                // tells manager to kill and remove
00087         bool                            m_bActive;
00088         bool                            m_bPaused;
00089         bool                            m_bInitialUpdate;       // initial update?
00090         shared_ptr<CProcess>    m_pNext;
00091         
00092 private:
00093         unsigned int    m_uProcessFlags;
00094 
00095 public:
00096         CProcess(int ntype, unsigned int uOrder = 0);
00097         virtual ~CProcess();    
00098 
00099 public:
00100 
00101         virtual bool                    IsDead(void) const { return(m_bKill);};
00102         virtual void                    Kill();
00103         
00104         virtual int                             GetType(void) const { return(m_iType); };
00105         virtual void                    SetType(const int t) { m_iType = t; };
00106 
00107         virtual bool                    IsActive(void) const { return m_bActive; };
00108         virtual void                    SetActive(const bool b) { m_bActive = b; };
00109         virtual bool                    IsAttached()const;
00110         virtual void                    SetAttached(const bool wantAttached);
00111 
00112         virtual bool                    IsPaused(void) const { return m_bPaused; };
00113         virtual void                    TogglePause() {m_bPaused = !m_bPaused;} // call to pause a process
00114         
00115         bool                                    IsInitialized()const { return ! m_bInitialUpdate; };
00116 
00117         shared_ptr<CProcess> const GetNext(void) const { return(m_pNext);}
00118         virtual void                    SetNext(shared_ptr<CProcess> nnext);
00119         
00120         virtual void                    OnUpdate(const int deltaMilliseconds);
00121         virtual void                    OnInitialize(){};
00122 
00123 private:
00124         CProcess();                                             //disable default construction
00125         CProcess(const CProcess& rhs);  //disable copy construction
00126 };
00127 
00128 inline void CProcess::OnUpdate( const int deltaMilliseconds )
00129 {
00130         if ( m_bInitialUpdate )
00131         {
00132                 OnInitialize();
00133                 m_bInitialUpdate = false;
00134         }
00135 }
00136 
00137 
00139 // ProcessList Description
00140 //
00141 // ProcessList is a list of smart CProcess pointers.
00142 //
00144 
00145 typedef std::list<shared_ptr<CProcess> > ProcessList;
00146 
00147 
00149 // CProcessManager Description
00150 //
00151 // CProcessManager is a container for CProcess objects.
00152 //
00154 
00155 class CProcessManager
00156 {
00157 public:
00158         void UpdateProcesses(int deltaMilliseconds);
00159         void DeleteProcessList();
00160         bool IsProcessActive( int nType );
00161         void Attach( shared_ptr<CProcess> pProcess );
00162         bool HasProcesses();
00163 
00164 protected:
00165         ProcessList     m_ProcessList;  
00166 
00167 private:
00168         void Detach( shared_ptr<CProcess> pProcess );
00169 };

00171 
00173 // CWaitProcess Description
00174 //
00175 // This process forces a delayed execution of a dependant process.
00176 //
00177 // CWaitProcess Example
00178 //   CWaitProcess *wait = new CWaitProcess(2000);
00179 //       MyOtherProcess *other = new MyOtherProcess;
00180 //   wait->SetNext(other);
00181 // 
00183 
00184 class CWaitProcess : public CProcess
00185 {
00186 protected:
00187         unsigned int    m_uStart;
00188         unsigned int    m_uStop;
00189 
00190 public:
00191         CWaitProcess(unsigned int iNumMill );
00192         virtual void OnUpdate(const int deltaMilliseconds);
00193 };
